property.seo_title: Explore Our Peaceful 0108 Sunrise Rental | Big Bear Lake Vacation Rental
property.seo_description: Book our sweet Sunrise #108 cabin rental in Big Bear, CA! It's pet friendly and has a lakefront location with a communal pool and spa access. Click here for more information.
property.seo_keywords: 0108-Sunrise, 0108-Sunrise in West Area
property.name: 0108-Sunrise
property.location_resort_name: Big Bear Lake~ Central Downtown | Mins to Activities
property.global_description:
Sunrise Lakefront Cabin at Shore Acres Lodge Big Bear

Discover the charm of Shore Acres Lodge, a relaxing rustic retreat with breathtaking views of Big Bear Lake and direct lake access. Managed by Big Bear Vacations, this historic site offers twelve mountain-style cabins on two acres of pine-shaded lakefront. Originally Potters Camp in the early 1900s, it now caters to all types of vacationers seeking a unique mountain experience, from couples and families to large groups for gatherings and events.

Each cabin is ideal for an adventure in the mountains offering the comforts from home, modern essentials, and an unbeatable location in the mountains. Reserved individually or combined together these adorable cottages and the incredible location becomes the perfect year round destination for any season, sitting just steps away from the shoreline at Big Bear Lake and within a short walk to local marinas and the downtown Village area. Relax on lake-view decks, enjoy the group patio area, or use the provided Charcoal BBQ for grilling.

Shore Acres Lodge boasts fantastic facilities: a lakefront location, seasonal shared boat dock, fishing area, summertime community swimming pool (weekends only, Memorial Day to Labor Day), outdoor horseshoe and volleyball pit, kids swing-set, large outdoor BBQ and picnic area, outdoor table tennis, onsite trash disposal, hi-speed WIFI access, flat screen streaming TVs, and a spacious pet-friendly property. (California Leash Law + Pet Fee Applies). Ample flat parking is available year round. Walking distance to the Big Bear Village and local marinas this is an ideal location any time of the year!

Sleeping Arrangements:
Bedroom 1:  Full/Twin Bunk + Twin/Twin Bunk
Bedroom 2:  Queen Bed

Sleeping Arrangements:
Private Full Bath- Bedroom 1
Private Full Bath- Bedroom 2

-Sleeps 7
-2 Car Driveway Parking
-2 Pets Welcome w/ Additional Fees
-817 Square Feet
Hotel Permit #: PR0013888

property.seo_description: Experience our wonderful Lake Shore #012 home rental in Big Bear. It has amazing amenities such as, a hot tub, jetted tub, pool table, and so much more. Book with us today!

STR PERMIT # VRR-2025-0002
EXP DATE: 02/13/2026
MAX OCC: 8
MAX CARS: 3
property.location_resort_name: Lakefront Location~ Lake Access on Site
property.global_description:
Lakeshore Cabin at Big Bear Lake | Hot Tub | Pool Table | Boat Dock

Welcome to Lake Shore, a stunning lakeside retreat nestled in the heart of Big Bear Lake. This charming home offers a perfect blend of comfort and adventure, making it an ideal getaway for families and friends alike. With breathtaking lake views and direct access to the water, you can immerse yourself in the beauty of nature right from your doorstep.

This spacious home features three beautifully appointed bedrooms and three bathrooms, accommodating up to eight guests. The main level boasts two luxurious king bedrooms, each with its own private bath, ensuring a restful night's sleep. A separate guest apartment downstairs includes a cozy queen bed and a bunk bed, perfect for kids or additional guests. The ambiance of Lake Shore is warm and inviting, with a well-designed living area that includes a fireplace and a smart TV for your entertainment. The fully equipped kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring modern appliances, a dining area, and all the essentials needed to prepare delicious meals. Enjoy your culinary creations on the private balcony or decked area, where you can soak in the stunning views while dining al fresco. Step outside to discover a private yard, complete with outdoor seating and a BBQ grill, perfect for summer cookouts. The property also offers access to a communal pool and hot tub, providing a refreshing escape during warmer months.

For those seeking adventure, the surrounding area is rich with activities such as hiking, skiing, and water sports, ensuring there's something for everyone. Safety and comfort are prioritized with features like a carbon monoxide detector, smoke detector, and central heating. The property is pet-friendly, allowing you to bring your furry friends along for the fun. With free Wi-Fi and a game room equipped with a pool table and air hockey, you'll have everything you need for a memorable stay. Located just a short walk from local shops, dining, and marinas, 012-Lake Shore is the perfect base for exploring all that Big Bear Lake has to offer. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to create lasting memories in a beautiful setting. Book your stay today and experience the magic of lakeside living!

Sleeping Arrangements:
Bedroom 1: King Bed, Streaming TV, Private Bath w/ Jetted Spa Tub- Entry Upper Level
Bedroom 2: King Bed, Private 3/4 Bath- Entry Upper Level
Bedroom 3 | Guest Apartment: Queen/Queen Bunk + Queen Bed, Streaming TV, 3/4 Bath- Lower/Separate Bottom Level

Bathroom Arrangements:
Private Full Bath w/ Jetted Spa Tub- Bedroom 1- Entry Level
Private 3/4 Bath (Shower Only)- Bedroom 2- Entry Level
Hallway 3/4 Bath (Shower Only)- Bedroom 3- Separate Guest Apartment- Lower Level

-Sleeps 8
-3 Car Driveway Parking
-3 Pets Welcome w/ Additional Fees
-1,511 Square Feet
City Permit #: VRR-2025-0002

property.global_description:
Shore Acres Lakefront Cabin Cluster | Great for Groups

Discover the charm of Shore Acres Lodge, a relaxing rustic retreat with breathtaking views of Big Bear Lake and direct lake access. Managed by Big Bear Vacations, this historic site offers twelve mountain-style cabins on two acres of pine-shaded lakefront. Originally Potters Camp in the early 1900s, it now caters to all types of vacationers seeking a unique mountain experience, from couples and families to large groups for gatherings and events.

NEW LODGE RENOVATIONS COMPLETED FALL OF 2023!!
Each cabin is ideal for an adventure in the mountains offering the comforts from home, modern essentials, and an unbeatable location in the mountains. Reserved individually or combined together these adorable cottages and the incredible location becomes the perfect year round destination for any season, sitting just steps away from the shoreline at Big Bear Lake and within a short walk to local marinas and the downtown Village area. Relax on lake-view decks, enjoy the group patio area, or use the provided Charcoal BBQ for grilling.

Shore Acres Lodge boasts fantastic facilities: a lakefront location, seasonal shared boat dock, fishing area, summertime community swimming pool (weekends only, Memorial Day to Labor Day), outdoor horseshoe and volleyball pit, kids swing-set, large outdoor BBQ and picnic area, outdoor table tennis, onsite trash disposal, hi-speed WIFI access, flat screen streaming TVs, and a spacious pet-friendly property. (California Leash Law + Pet Fee Applies). Ample flat parking is available year-round. Walking distance to the Big Bear Village and local marinas this is an ideal location any time of the year!

**NOTE** Our lodge facilities are publicly accessible to all Big Bear Vacations guests. property.location_resort_name: Lakefront Location~ Lake Access on Site
property.global_description:
Breezy One Lakeside Family Cabin at Big Bear

Welcome to Breezy One- this is the perfect lakeside retreat for a group of friends, family reunion, or couple's retreat to the mountains boasting all that you need for a memorable and relaxing trip no matter the season you choose to visit. Sitting just a mile from the Big Bear Village and local marinas you have the very best of Big Bear right at your fingertips from this spacious two story chalet. Boasting the necessities from home along with cooking and dining essentials you will have a spacious lakeside yard including a nice patio area, seasonal boat dock, and BBQ area for your enjoyment- the possibilities are endless from here.

Enter into a cozy and warm living room area where you can snuggle up on the leather sofas and warm your toes together in front of the toasty wood burning fireplace as you enjoy your lakeside location and amazing views. Enjoy a movie night in at your cabin on the flat screen TV with Cable and complimentary hi speed WIFI internet supplied for you by the owners. Around the corner you will find the equipped kitchen and dining areas complete with all that the chef of your group will need to whip up your home cooked meals or holidays feasts right here at the cabin- oak cabinets pair with counter space and cookware plus appliances and a dishwasher to ensure that your cleanup is a breeze. A separate laundry room area offers your group a washer and dryer on hand for those wet snow clothes or extended visits here in the mountains as an added convenience.

This spacious retreat offers four comfortable sleeping areas and plenty of bathrooms for a comfortable group vacation, all of which are made up for your group with warm linens, blankets, pillows, and fresh shower towels when you arrive. Outside the beautiful property offers patio seating and a picnic table where your group can enjoy your time here together in the mountains as you grill up your freshly caught dinner from the lake on the Charcoal BBQ. The summer months are the absolute best here at Breezy Cabin with a lakeside location offering a seasonal boat dock for your lake activities and toys all while located within a short stroll to local marinas and the Village shops for dining and entertainment. This home is the larger of two properties that share this location, both are available to rent separately or together for even more family or friends to join in the adventure.

Sleeping Arrangements:
Bedroom 1: Full/Twin Bunk + Queen Bed, TV w/ Cable - Downstairs Entry Level
Bedroom 2: Queen Bed + Twin Bed, TV w/ Cable - Upstairs 2nd Level
Bedroom 3: Queen Bed, TV w/ Cable- Upstairs 2nd Level
Bedroom 4: King Bed- TV w/ Cable - Upstairs 2nd Level

Bathroom Arrangements:
Hallway Half Bath + Laundry Room- Downstairs Entry Level
Hallway Full Bath- Downstairs Entry Level
Hallway Full Bath- Downstairs Entry Level
Hallway Full Bath- Upstairs 2nd Level
Hallway Full Bath- Upstairs 2nd Level

-Sleeps 9
-3 Car Driveway Parking
-NO PETS ALLOWED- Fines Imposed for Pets Found on Property
-1,890 Square Feet
City Permit #: VRR-2024-0970

property.global_description:
Breezy Estate Lakeside Two Cabin Group Combo Property

Welcome to Breezy Estate!! Perfect for a family vacation, group of friends, corporate retreat, or just a come together of any kind this fabulous property consists of a combination of two furnished lakeside cabins next to each other in a quiet Mallard Bay location which is an awesome destination, providing all that you need for a large group or multi-family vacation to the mountains. Furnished with the essentials and necessities for a memorable trip you will love this location which is especially awesome in the summer months with a seasonal boat dock available for your lake activities.

Together this wonderful combo of properties features two fully equipped kitchens with basic appliances and dishwashers, cookware and utensils, as well as bay view dining room areas with table seating for meals on the lower entry levels. Both homes each have cozy and warm living room areas complete with comfortable mountain furnishings and d&eacute;cor, toasty wood burning fireplaces, plus a washer and dryer is available within each home for your use. Comfortable sleeping quarters and ample bathrooms are sprawled out on both levels of each chalet combining together to create 7 bedrooms each made up for your group with warm linens, blankets, pillows, and fresh shower towels when you arrive for your visit. Breezy Estate is a most relaxing group destination in a serene lakeside alpine mountain setting, with outdoor seating areas and Charcoal BBQ's, plus lake and bay access the possibilities for your trip are endless from here. You'll be within a short walk to the downtown Village shops and dining, local marinas for boat and lake activities, and minutes to the resorts making this an unbeatable year-round location for your next vacation.

Sleeping Arrangements:
Bedroom 1: Full/Twin Bunk + Queen Bed, TV w/ Cable- Downstairs Entry Level

property.global_description:
Frank's Old Bear Lakefront Family Cabin in Big Bear

Frank's Old Bear is a nicely remodeled and fully furnished single story family cabin that sits on a gorgeous, treed lot right on the shores of Big Bear Lake, with community boat dock access, a fenced back yard and within a short walk to the downtown Village or local marinas for lake activities, this is the perfect destination for any mountain vacation! You will absolutely love the amazing front deck with an gorgeous views of the lake and surroundings, newer patio furniture, and a piped Natural BBQ for your use during your stay.

Enter into the newly renovated cozy living room with a toasty wood fireplace, leather furnishings, and a big flat screen TV for you to pop on your favorite movie or show, there is Cable and complimentary hi speed WIFI provided for your enjoyment so you can sit together and warm your toes as you watch the snow falling outside. The equipped kitchen has the essentials for preparing your home-cooked meals with two separate dining tables for seating along with cookware and utensils, general appliances, plus a convenient bathroom is available off of the kitchen.

Both bedrooms offer a flat screen TV with Cable and are made up for your group with warm linens, blankets, pillows, and fresh shower towels for your visit when you arrive. The fully fenced and spacious back yard provides privacy and security while giving your family and fur-babies a relaxing and enjoyable space to soak up this alpine environment. Frank's Old Bear is truly a fabulous cabin, pairing the comforts of home with a most spectacular lakefront location, plus within a walk to most activities, this is the perfect destination for your next stay no matter the reason or the season!

property.global_description:
Fisherman's Paradise | Hot Tub~ Pool Table~ Views~

Welcome to Fisherman's Paradise! Perfect for a group of friends or family vacation this spacious and fully furnished mountain lake house is the ultimate space to spend your next vacation to the mountains, boasting all that your group needs for a perfect trip, situated on the west end of the lake in deep water with a dock, making this cabin a true "Fisherman's Paradise". Hop in the car and your party is within a quick ten minute car ride to the ski resorts or Village or take a short stroll over to Holloways marina about a block away for summertime boat rentals and the local Pirate Ship tour- the possibilities are endless from this spacious family lake house.

Enter on the upper level into the cozy living room area you are greeted with spacious vaulted knotty pine ceilings and big open lake-view windows that let in the perfect balance of natural lighting and beautiful views of the snow falling over the lake right outside. You will love snuggling on the comfy couches as you warm your toes together in front of the toasty wood burning fireplace and pop on a movie on the flat screen TV with Cable and complimentary hi speed WIFI internet provided for your enjoyment. The chef of your group will love the modern and equipped kitchen boasting all that you need for whipping up home cooked meals and holiday feasts including stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher to ensure your cleanup is a breeze plus ample dining options are available between the custom dining table and breakfast bar stools so your group can enjoy your meals together comfortably.

Venturing downstairs you will find a comfy and equipped game room with wet bar and fridges, full size pool table, plus deck access to the massive sundeck where you can take up your nights soaking under the stars in the private outdoor hot tub, or walk down to the lake and boat dock below for water activities.* NOTE: Lake/Dock are accessible only by dirt footpath down from the cabin- Agility and ample footwear REQUIRED for access.*  Three comfortably furnished bedrooms including the primary suite and two lower level bathrooms are also hosted here on the lower downstairs level of this spacious chalet, all of which are made up for your group with warm linens, blankets, pillows, and fresh shower towels for your vacation stay when you arrive. Whatever the season you choose to visit Big Bear this home is truly a paradise for all ages and groups, pairing the necessities from home with awesome amenities and a superb location, you are sure to make the most of your experience here at Fisherman's Paradise!

property.global_description:
Cove Lakefront Chalet | Hot Tub | Boat Dock |Views

Looking to experience the ultimate Big Bear vacation right from the shoreline!? Cove Lakefront Chalet is the perfect vacation home for just that! Sitting on the shoreline in the quiet Boulder Bay neighborhood of the valley, your group will have an abundance of activities right at your fingertips while still within a ten-minute car ride to the ski resorts or downtown Village shops. Sprawling in fully furnished spaces for your group to enjoy our two-story home has all that you need for a memorable visit to the mountains including entertaining games, kitchen essentials, and a new private hot tub under the stars! 

Enter into a grand living room area upon entry with vaulted knotty pine cathedral ceilings and soaring picture windows to take in the panoramic lake views surrounding you. Comfortable sitting couches offer great spaces to sit and make memories around a toasty rock wood-burning fireplace. Enjoy your favorite movie on the massive flat-screen Streaming TV or just snuggle up and watch the snow falling outside. (Guests must have their own accounts to use Streaming services.) There are two separate lake view dining areas that each offer a custom formal log dining table for your group or holiday meals together along with deck access and more fantastic lake views. The breakfast bar pairs stool seats and gorgeous granite countertops for your chef to prepare your home-cooked meals. The oak cabinets are stocked with cookware and utensils for your convenience while general appliances and a dishwasher ensure that your meals are a breeze here!

Head downstairs to the cozy family room for more added fun where you will find sitting couches around one more natural wood fireplace and another huge TV. Enjoy a game of pool on the full-size billiards table, foosball table, arcade basketball, or just watch all the action from the mini bar. This is a great space to make wonderful memories together. A separate laundry room area offers a washer and dryer for your extended stays or wet snow clothes to keep things convenient. All four bedrooms and bathrooms are made up for your visit with warm linens, blankets, pillows, and fresh shower towels plus offer deck views. Venture outside to enjoy the expansive wrapped sun decks and expansive lakefront property with a seasonal boat dock. (Water levels pending access) Enjoying grilling up your freshly caught dinner on the natural gas BBQ as you enjoy the patio furnishings or take a soak in the new private hot tub under the stars as you unwind after a fun day of adventures out on the lake. Cove Lakefront Chalet truly has it all ensuring groups and families have the very best of Big Bear at their fingertips our furnished mountain chalet has all that you need for a memorable and relaxing lakeside vacation. Don't miss your chance to book this spectacular chalet for your upcoming mountain vacation today!

property.global_description:
Lakeview Getaway- Boat Dock | Essentials | Walk to Marina

Welcome to Lakeview Getaway, where the charm of a furnished family lake house meets the comfort of a mountain escape cabin, creating the perfect setting for a memorable vacation with friends or family in Big Bear. Nestled in a quiet and serene cove, this cozy retreat offers year-round beauty and convenience, keeping you just a short stroll away from local marinas and the downtown Village. A quick drive will get you to grocery stores or ski resorts in under ten minutes. Plus, enjoy the seasonal boat dock for summer lake adventures! (Water Levels Pending - Photo is May 2023)

Step into the warm and inviting family room, where rustic mountain charm envelops you. Original wood walls and ceilings, a toasty brick fireplace, and stunning open windows offer wonderful lake views. Snuggle up on the comfy couches, warm your toes by the wood-burning fireplace, and enjoy a movie on the flat-screen Streaming TV with complimentary high-speed WiFi provided by the owner. (Guests must have their own accounts to access Streaming Services.)

The open floor plan at Lakeview Getaway is perfect for entertaining, whether hosting a dinner party or celebrating a holiday feast. The family room flows seamlessly into the charming dining area and open kitchen, keeping everyone connected as you prepare meals. The breakfast island with barstools and a log dining table with seating for six create a cozy dining experience with wonderful views. The freshly remodeled kitchen features oak cabinets stocked with cookware and utensils, and general appliances, including a dishwasher, make cleanup a breeze. A separate laundry room offers convenient storage for snow gear and includes a washer and dryer for wet snow clothes or extended stays.

Enjoy easy access to two lower-level bedrooms and bathrooms, including the spacious primary suite with its own private half-bathroom. Upstairs, you'll find the final bathroom and sleeping quarters, featuring a cozy bedroom and shared loft space with a table and chairs for relaxing or playing games. Each bed is made up with warm linens, blankets, pillows, and fresh shower towels, ensuring your comfort from the moment you arrive.

Step outside to experience the exceptional lakeside property, featuring great patio spaces and a propane BBQ perfect for grilling up your freshly caught dinner from the lake. Unwind in the private bay-side yard under a million stars, soaking away the day's adventures. With a seasonal boat dock (water levels pending) for summer activities, Lakeview Getaway truly has it all. Make this your home away from home in the mountains and live your vacation dreams today!

Escape to Forest Shores Lake View Condo, your modern lakefront retreat perfectly positioned in the heart of Big Bear's bustling Village. This stylish townhouse delivers the ultimate blend of comfort, adventure, and convenience ideal for families, couples, or friends seeking an unforgettable mountain getaway. Enjoy unbeatable walkability to local shops, marinas, restaurants, and entertainment, while Snow Summit, Bear Mountain, and major grocery stores are just a quick 10-minute drive away. Inside, soak in breathtaking lake views from the main living level, complete with plush seating, a cozy gas fireplace, and a private balcony where you can watch summer fireworks or winter snowfall drift across the water. The fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, oak cabinetry, and a dual dining setup makes meal prep effortless, while in-unit laundry adds extra convenience for extended stays.

With a private studio suite downstairs and two inviting bedrooms upstairs, every guest enjoys comfort, privacy, and hotel-quality linens. Step outside to your furnished patio with a natural gas BBQ or explore the community's resort-style amenities, including a seasonal boat dock, lakefront shoreline access, and a pool and hot tub. Whether you're here for lakeside relaxation, snow-season adventure, or Village nightlife, Forest Shores Lake View Condo offers the perfect Big Bear experience. Book your stay today and enjoy mountain living at its best.

property.global_description:
Lakefront Village Castle | Amazing Lake Views

Brace yourselves for the vacation of a lifetime here at Lakefront Village Castle! Completely renovated from head to toe with your vacation experience in mind and perfect for a group getaway to the lake or family vacation to the mountains our spacious castle offers all that you need to vacation in comfort and style together right on the shore of Big Bear Lake in the heart of the downtown Village. Gourmet kitchen and dining essentials pair with added entertainment and modern mountain amenities within this amazing lakefront bay location which includes your own private boat dock for the lake toys in the warmer months- come experience this incredible vacation home away from home for your next retreat today!

Enter the lower level of your mountain chalet where you are greeted with big open windows that provide the perfect balance of natural lighting and amazing views of the lake and marina outside. The chef of your group will find all that you need to prepare your home cooked meals and family holiday feasts packed into the gourmet kitchen and formal dining area, complete with oak cabinets stocked with cookware and utensils, general appliances, and a dishwasher to ensure your cleanup is a breeze here. Cozy up together in the den which offers the lower level bathroom and a separate laundry room with a washer and dryer for those wet snow clothes or extended visits to the mountains any time of the year. Challenge the group at a game of foosball or pop on your favorite movie on many flat screen Streaming TVs throughout the property. Warm your toes in front of the toasty wood burning fireplace as you watch the snow falling outside in the winter months or head out on the lake for fishing and boating activities right from your cabin.

Head upstairs where your three spacious sleeping quarters and two of the group's bathrooms are located, each room offers a mounted flat screen Streaming TV, warm linens, blankets, pillows, and fresh shower towels as well as incredible lake and valley views. The spacious primary suite offers incredible views and a private attached bathroom for the group's added privacy. Outside the perfectly manicured property offers plenty of relaxing spaces for you to spend your time unwinding under soaring pine trees and shooting stars and includes a great patio area and sun decks with a propane BBQ for you to grill up your freshly caught dinner from the lake. The seasonal boat dock gives you the opportunity to rent lake toys and make the most out of this amazing location. Packed with all that you need to make lifelong memories together at Big Bear your group will want to return year after year to your new home away from home on the lake!

property.global_description:
Serenity Cove Lake House- Incredible Waterfront Oasis Retreat

Welcome to Serenity Cove&mdash;where luxury meets family adventure in a secluded, fun-filled retreat at Big Bear Lake's prestigious Gilner Point. Serenity Cove is a stunning waterfront haven that blends elegance with relaxation, offering breathtaking views and an unmatched sense of privacy. Escape the city and immerse yourself in nature's beauty, from the majestic mountains to the serene lakeside. Your experience begins with our private dock, perfect for boating, fishing, kayaking, and paddleboarding. For those who love the outdoors, nearby hiking trails provide panoramic vistas, ideal for capturing great photos.

Inside, discover a world of comfort and excitement. The expansive game room is perfect for family fun, with board games, movies, and a loft space that's a dream for kids or anyone young at heart. Our three king bedrooms and two and a half baths offer plenty of room for everyone, while the large, fully equipped kitchen invites culinary creativity&mdash;ideal for family feasts or group meals. Step out onto the extended deck for a barbecue or unwind in the hot tub under a canopy of stars. Whether you're soaking in the eight-person spa or enjoying the cozy warmth of one of the three wood-burning fireplaces, your cabin offers the perfect blend of relaxation and excitement.

This isn't just a luxurious escape; it's also packed with modern conveniences including smart home features like a Google Home thermostat, a Bose speaker with an Apple adapter, and an EV charger port, every detail is designed with excellence in mind. Ample driveway parking ensures that your cars and trailers are accommodated with ease. This family-friendly oasis is surrounded by lush landscaping, creating a tranquil and charming setting. Around the corner from Holloway's Marina and countless opportunities for adventure, Serenity Cove is more than just a home&mdash;it's an unforgettable escape where lifelong memories are made.

property.location_resort_name: Lakefront Location~ Lake Access on Site
property.global_description:
Bear Lake Lodge Lakefront | Incredible Lake House Chalet

Welcome to Bear Lake Lodge! This centrally located Eagle Point lakefront chalet is custom built from the ground up with your vacation stay in mind. Boasting spectacular lake views from every room and an incredible floor plan, this home provides plenty of room for families, friends, corporate retreats, and entertaining within an incredible lakefront setting. Sitting within minutes to the slopes, Village shops, and local Big Bear marinas, you have the best of Big Bear right at your fingertips from here!

Including three levels of comfortable living space, your group has convenient access to 5 spacious bedrooms, 6 modern bathrooms, a fun packed game room, plus a gourmet kitchen and formal dining area- there is an abundance of space to spend time making memories with your loved ones. Enjoy the open floor plan showcasing the lodge style furnishings, stone fireplaces, knotty pine open beamed cathedral ceilings, hardwood floors, and the most amazing views of Big Bear Lake!

Three levels of spacious sun decks wrap the property overlooking Big Bear Lake, making for the ideal place to relax against the great outdoors and socialize together under the eagle-perch pines. You'll love soaking your muscles in the private 8-person spa on the lower deck as you take in the view plus a private boat dock is available in the warmer summer months. Bear Lake Lodge is a spectacular custom home, perfect for any occasion to the mountains, and ready for your next Big Bear vacation!

Sleeping Arrangements: 
Bedroom 1: King Bed, Fireplace, Private Balcony, Private Bath- Upstairs 3rd Level
Bedroom 2: King Bed, Lake Views, Private Bath- Upstairs 3rd Level
Bedroom 3: Two Twin/Twin Bunk Beds, Private Bath- Upstairs 3rd Level
Bedroom 4: Two Twin/Twin Bunk Beds- Downstairs Lower Level
Bedroom 5: King Bed + Twin/Twin Bunk Bed, Private Bath- Downstairs Lower Level

Bathroom Arrangements: 
Private Full Bath- Bedroom 1- Upstairs 3rd Level
Hallway 3/4 Bath- Upstairs 3rd Level
Private Full Bath- Bedroom 2- Upstairs 3rd Level
Private Bath- Bedroom 3- Downstairs Lower Level
Private Bath- Bedroom 5- Downstairs Lower Level
Hallway Half Bath- Middle Entry Level

-Sleeps 14- 12 Adults Max + 2 Kids
-5 Car Driveway Parking
-2 Pets Welcome With Additional Fees
-5,641 Square Feet
-City Permit #: VRR-2026-0103

property.location_resort_name: Village Downtown~ Walk to Shopping | Walk to Lake
property.global_description:
Crystal Pines at Big Bear Lake | Walk to Boulder Bay Park | Family-Friendly Retreat

Discover the perfect Big Bear getaway at Crystal Pines, a beautifully upgraded mountain retreat just a short walk to Boulder Bay, lake access, kayaking, fishing, and scenic shoreline trails. Located on Waterview Dr.one of Boulder Bay's most peaceful and desirable pockets this three-bedroom, two-bath home is designed for relaxation, adventure, and unforgettable mountain memories.

Step into soaring ceilings, warm wood finishes, and two stunning stone fireplaces that create the ultimate cozy atmosphere after a day on the lake or the slopes. The expansive wraparound deck offers treetop views and a charming peek-a-boo look at Big Bear Lake, giving you the perfect setting for morning coffee, evening cocktails, or stargazing under the pines.

Inside, the open-concept layout is ideal for families and groups. The spacious living room flows seamlessly into the dining area and fully equipped kitchen, making it easy to cook, gather, and connect. All bedrooms are thoughtfully decorated with a modern mountain feel, and the bonus room above the garage provides extra space for kids, teens, game nights, or remote work.

Enjoy a fully fenced yard, a rare feature in Big Bear, offering privacy and a safe place for children or pets to play. Parking is easy with a two-car garage and additional driveway space, giving you stress-free access year-round.

With its walkable location near the lake and its quick drive to The Village, hiking trails, Boulder Bay Park, Pleasure Point Marina, and ski resorts, Crystal Pines gives you everything you need for a year-round adventure, whether you're here to ski, boat, hike, or unwind.

Book your stay and experience the comfort, charm, and convenience that make Crystal Pines the perfect home base for your Big Bear escape.

Sleeping Arrangements: 
Bedroom 1: Queen Bed Entry Level 
Bedroom 2: King Bed upper level 
Bedroom 3: Queen bed upper level 
Bedroom 4: Queen bed 1 twin bunk, Sleeper sofa, foosball table garage upper level  

Bathroom Arrangements:
Full Bath entry level shared 
Full Bath upper level shared 
Half Bath- located in laundry room entry level 

-Sleeps 12
-3 Cars Driveway Parking 
-No Pets Allowed
-2,494 Square Feet
-City Permit #: VRR-2025-2431
